answers.answer: Yes I have gestational diabetes n I am going thru similar....at first I lost 4 pounds the first week n then I will gain a pound back and then I will loose it again

I have GD also. When I first started dieting I noticed at my apts I had barely gained any weight.. I thought it was a bad thing but my doc has always said my baby and I are at very healthy weights. I'm 39+ 3 days I have only gained about 26 lbs but 7 of that is my baby.
Thanks, I was wondering if that was normal
I also have GD and I lost couples pounds. My dr didnt worry about that she said that normal and me and my baby are healty.

question: I have gestational diabetes and ever since the dietitian put me on a food plan that I follow religiously, i have lost 7 pounds, so now at 37 weeks I have only gained 12 pounds, has anyone else experienced that?
title: gestational diabetes and weight
